data.name: Ants With Guns
data.detailed_description:
Ants have waged wars longer than humans have walked the earth. But, for far too long, we've underestimated them. Recently, ant-thropologists have uncovered evidence of these insects inventing and utilizing advanced war machines. So we've created a scientifically accurate battle simulator of what it's like when ants fight.


So now you can make ants battle for queen and candy in this new breed of sandbox battle simulator.

Features



  • Ants. Ants with guns.

  • Flying units that get into dog fights and attacked by AA guns. You can fly them too, or don't. Or do. They've got guns. That sounds fun.

  • Spider tanks. GIANT spider tanks. Giant spiders and kaiju sized monster bug boss fights.

  • Ants. Ants with guns. Ants with guns that you can command in battle and directly control in first or third person.

  • Learn each unit's name, then tragically mourn them when they blow up five seconds later.

  • So many ants with guns that it needed to be said thrice.



    *No ants were harmed in the making of this game. Or maybe they were. I don't know. Nobody was really paying attention.

data.short_description: Ants with guns is a sandbox battle simulator that lets you play with ants and have them battle one another like you were a child again or if you're in your childhood it lets you do what you probably already do. Except a lot cooler than your childhood because they’ve got guns... and rocket flies.
